title: Spotify Notes
description: A Chrome extension that lets users attach personal notes to songs in Spotify, preserving meaningful lyrics, memories, or reflections tied to each track.

title: Photographers' Favorites
description: A collection of favorite photos taken by the photography staff at the Michigan Daily.

title: Flappy Fish
description: An aquatic spinoff of Flappy Bird, with color customization, powerups, and dynamic object spawning!
